All Implemented Interfaces:
HasClickHandlers, HasDoubleClickHandlers, HasAttachHandlers, HasResizeHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasEnabled, HasVisibility, IsWidget, BeforeHideEvent.HasBeforeHideHandlers, BeforeShowContextMenuEvent.HasBeforeShowContextMenuHandler, BeforeShowEvent.HasBeforeShowHandlers, BlurEvent.HasBlurHandlers, DisableEvent.HasDisableHandlers, EnableEvent.HasEnableHandlers, FocusEvent.HasFocusHandlers, HideEvent.HasHideHandlers, MoveEvent.HasMoveHandlers, SelectEvent.HasSelectHandlers, ShowContextMenuEvent.HasShowContextMenuHandler, ShowEvent.HasShowHandlers, SplitBarDragEvent.HasSplitBarDragHandlers, HasFocusSupport, HasItemId
public class SplitBar
extends Component
implements HasClickHandlers, HasDoubleClickHandlers, SplitBarDragEvent.HasSplitBarDragHandlers, SelectEvent.HasSelectHandlers

Creates a draggable splitter on the side of a widget.

setCollapsible

public void setCollapsible(boolean collapsible)
True to show a mini-collapse tool in the split bar (defaults to false). When clicked, the collapse event is fired.

Parameters:
collapsible - true to add the mini-collapse tool
